sources.title: Two Comrades Were Serving
sources.description:
Drama by Evgeny Karelov "Two Comrades Were Serving"

Civil War. A story about a difficult friendship between two people who are different in character and upbringing - a front-line cameraman Nekrasov and his assistant Karyakin, who vigilantly takes care of a helpless and, in his opinion, not quite reliable "photographer". The command instructs them to establish aerial reconnaissance and film enemy fortifications. Their first flight ends in an airplane crash...

IMDb: 7,9

Year of production: 1968

Director: Evgeniy Karelov
Screenwriters: Dunsky Yuliy, Frid Valeriy
Composer: Evgeny Ptichkin
Operators: Ardabyevsky Mikhail, Belokopytov Viktor
Production Designers: Boris Tsarev, Lev Semyonov

Cast: Bykov Rolan, Papanov Anatoly, Savvina Iya, Burlyaev Nikolai, Yankovsky Rostislav, Yankovsky Oleg, Demidova Alla, Vysotsky Vladimir, Tkachuk Roman, Krylov Petr
